name: Deadshot (Calvin Art Games)
description:
Deadshot

This game is a wave-based shoot em up/bullet hell game inspired by Enter the Gungeon and Disc Room. 

Red Three: Deadshot is the third game in the Red franchise. Don't worry, you don't need to play the previous games to play this one (this game is objectively the best one). Thanks for playing this game and/or downloading it.

While none of the Red games are realated, they are all fun in my opinion. They are also very different from each other and have come a long way.

Instructions:

- Use arrow keys or wasd to move

- Avoid the Red Razor-Blades

- Point and click with your mouse to shoot your gun

- In between waves, you can talk to the shopkeeper

- When you a Deadshot (the fastest red blade) it will drop blue scraps

- Sell those scraps to get money and play for upgrades or armour

- The only way to get past a wave is to first kill the three Deadshots, and then kill whatever is left

List of Razor-Blade Types:

- Thorns are the smallest type, they slide down the screen at random

- Reapers are the second smallest. These guys track your x position and slide down towards you

- Gurderers are the square-shaped type, they move slow and bounce off the walls

- Arrowheads look like, well, arrowheads. They follow you around like heat-seeking missiles, but don't worry, they are very slow

- Deadshots are the fastest Razor-Blades, they drop scraps when they die and take a ton of bullets to defeat. Every wave they get stronger and stronger.

Created on April 3rd of 2023 by Calvin Art Games

Thanks for playing :)
